1.details: Analyze code quality, architecture patterns, performance optimization opportunities, security vulnerabilities, and technical debt across all modules (Core, Operators, Gfx, Editor, Gui)

2.details: Review API documentation, code comments, README files, developer onboarding materials, and overall developer experience

3.details: Evaluate UI/UX design, user workflows, accessibility, performance from end-user perspective, and interface consistency

4.details: Assess testing coverage, CI/CD pipeline, code quality metrics, automated testing strategies, and bug tracking processes

5.details: Identify performance bottlenecks, memory usage patterns, scalability limitations, and optimization opportunities

6.details: Evaluate community engagement tools, plugin ecosystem, contribution guidelines, release management, and project sustainability

7.details: Review security practices, dependency management, vulnerability scanning, and compliance with industry standards

8.details: Compile all findings into a structured list of 100 specific, actionable improvements categorized by priority and impact
